info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT UNION AND WESTERN RICHMOND COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Brunswick, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Plainfield around 510 PM EDT. Linden, Clark and Union around 530 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Fanwood, Mountainside, Annadale, Rahway, Roselle Park, Westfield, Cranford, Scotch Plains, Springfield and Heartland Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
